column1: Little Goat Diner////I don't even know where to begin.  Picture yourself in a car
column2: and out of nowhere you're blind-sided.  By definition
column3: you didn't see it coming.  That's how I felt about this place on bite numero uno.  Sure
column4: it is on short lists for being one of the best eats in the city
column5: but to me it was a place to grab a bite on a Sunday.  Hey
column6: I'm still new to the city.  Okay
